rows.label: tlk41200122_03_msg0001
rows.name:
It's time to feed the Armu!
It's a properly balanced meal, too!

rows.label: tlk41200122_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Just because Armu are herbivores doesn't
mean they only eat pasture grass, you know?

rows.label: tlk41200122_03_msg0003
rows.name:
You have to give them Ruby Mangosteens to strengthen their teeth,
and Deadly Kiwis to keep their vitamins
in balance!

rows.label: tlk41200122_03_msg0004
rows.name: Think it's a lot of work?

rows.label: tlk41200122_03_msg0005
rows.name:
But for my cute little Armu,
it's no trouble at all.
